content: In order to use our app, you need agree with this End User License Agreement (EULA).
- You are not allow to upload, chat, exchange, share:
• Content that incites violence, hatred, discriminates, race against any person or organization.
• Content that describes or incites dangerous or terrorist activities.
• Content of buying and selling weapons, prohibited substances and products.
- Make sure you have full rights to your content, not infringing the copyright, trademark, rights of privacy, rights of publicity, other intellectual property rights of any person or entity.
